subject: Difference running junit in ant compared to Eclipse
msgSnippet: Hi, I execute a Junit test in Eclipse fine. Then when I run the same test in Ant I get a NullPointerException. Have anyone experienced the same problem? Any
messageBody:
Hi,

I execute a Junit test in Eclipse fine. Then when I run the same test
in Ant I get a NullPointerException.
Have anyone experienced the same problem?

Any hints!

cheers,

//mikael
